execution_tracking.verification_command: npm run typecheck; node --import tsx --test tests/unit/audit-log-route.test.ts
execution_tracking.verification_notes: Added owner-only `GET /api/v1/audit-logs` with clinic-scoped filtering (action/entity/actor/search/date/page/pageSize), standard response envelopes, and chain-integrity metadata from `auditLogService`. Route tests verify OWNER access, tenant scoping, filters, unauthenticated `401`, non-owner `403`, and invalid pagination `400`.

evidence.item: When work starts/completes, record changed files, test commands, screenshots (UI tasks), and commit/PR references here.
Endpoint verification (unit test): `GET /api/v1/audit-logs` returns `200` with paginated `items` and `chainIntegrity` metadata for OWNER users.
Owner-only/RBAC verification: missing auth returns `401`; `RECEPTIONIST` role returns `403`.
Filter/query verification: `action=INVOICE_SENT` filter narrows results to one entry; `page=0` returns `400`.
Typecheck/tests passed: `npm run typecheck`; `node --import tsx --test tests/unit/audit-log-route.test.ts`.
Feature commit: 441728e (feat(healio-audit): audit log api route).
